crypto.name: Ataa
crypto.desc: Cryptography challenges, like the Atta, require creativity and constructive thinking to unravel their complexities and secure sensitive information.

crypto.name: Avini
crypto.desc: The Avini challenge in cryptography involves doubling a point on elliptic curves (ECC); your task is to identify the vulnerability and capture the flag.

crypto.name: Clement
crypto.desc: Welcome to Clement Crypto Challenge, we have gained access to a very powerful supercomputer with high processing capabilities. Try to connect to the app running on this computer and find the flag.

crypto.name: Gasdeep
crypto.desc: The Gasdeep challenge utilizes finite fields for message encryption; your objective is to explore potential weaknesses in the system to find a way to break it.

crypto.name: Goliver
crypto.desc:
Welcome to the Goliver World! You can play with ECC points on BTC curve. Your mission is to find the secret key and sweep wallets!

There was a tiny edit in Goliver's challenge, please download the source code again.

crypto.name: Heidi
crypto.desc:
The Heidi challenge employs matrices over finite fields for message encryption, and we are unable to decrypt it.

Note: s/CCTF/ASIS

forensic.name: Cosmopolitan
forensic.desc: The Cosmopolitan challenge revolves around a seemingly ordinary document that conceals a highly secret message within its contents.

forensic.name: Old But Gold
forensic.desc: The Old But Gold challenge examines the intricacies and quirks of an aging application, prompting participants to uncover its hidden value and functionality.

forensic.name: Pixels
forensic.desc: The Pixels challenge involves a dataset where crucial messages are hidden within its data, requiring careful analysis to reveal their significance.

forensic.name: Popy
forensic.desc: The Popy challenge involves encrypted and corrupted documents discovered during a cloud app breach, and your mission is to recover the hidden secret content within them.

misc.name: Phantom Theft
misc.desc: The Phantom Theft challenge involves a Bitcoin wallet generation core code containing a significant vulnerability, allowing attackers to discover the private keys.

misc.name: Snoopy
misc.desc: The Snoopy challenge involves analyzing unusual traffic captured from a recent APT attack by anonymous hackers; your task is to uncover the hidden secret flag!

misc.name: Visual Symphony
misc.desc: The Visual Symphony challenge features an enigmatic file discovered near control devices, prompting the quest to uncover the hidden flag within its contents.

pwn.name: Dive into Pool
pwn.desc: The Dive into Pool challenge tests your proficiency in pwnable to uncover hidden vulnerabilities. So dive into this seed pool!

pwn.name: Grades
pwn.desc: I wrote a program to track my grades! Try to pwn it and catch my grades!!

pwn.name: Pizza
pwn.desc: Pizza delivery has never been easier!

pwn.name: SinaScript
pwn.desc: JavaScript is just dumb. Time to switch to a better language like SinaScript!!!

pwn.name: Uncompetitive Programming
pwn.desc: All that matters is that my code runs in 1 second, right? This is an Uncompetitive_Programming!!

pwn.name: What To Do
pwn.desc: The What to do? challenge simulates a self-reflective state, prompting you to consider and analyze your own actions and decisions.

rev.name: Alchemist
rev.desc: The Alchemist challenge involves an encryptor for any file, and your task is to reverse engineer it to successfully decrypt the content.

rev.name: Bedme
rev.desc: The Bedme challenge revolves around transferring data using visually appealing images, and your mission is to uncover the hidden secret flag within them.

rev.name: Break Control
rev.desc: The Break Control utilizes sophisticated encryption methods to obfuscate the input file, making it difficult to reverse engineer the binary and extract the concealed flag.

rev.name: Hast
rev.desc: The Hast binary attempts to compress specific input files, necessitating the reversal of its functionality to decompress the data.

rev.name: Hoda
rev.desc:
The Hoda binary employs an unconventional method to print the flag, requiring the identification of specific conditions or inputs to trigger its execution and reveal the concealed message.

Note: Flag = ASIS{WHAT_YOU_FIND}

rev.name: Kettle
rev.desc: The Kettle is designed to heat water for tea, but understanding its internal mechanisms could potentially allow for modifications to accelerate its heating process.

web.name: Cat Rater
web.desc: My new startup is about a website that rates how cute cats are.

web.name: Dangling
web.desc: I can see the flag dangling from the window.
